message: Just a place to hang out.
Convore is like IRC and a forum mashed together.
Hacked.net.au is a easy to remember link to the Hacked room on Convore.
I thought I'd set this up just to see what Convore was all about and how it works.
Feel free to join in the channel and join the conversation!
Different topics, but the style of them is more conversational.
